item.description:
On the distant planet of Kordra, a giant pageant continent is being reshaped as tectonic shifts tear the land apart, forcing each nation into war.

Kordran Conflict is a game that simulates combat operations in a sci-fi setting. It's unique gameplay blends elements of CCGs with a streamlined turn-based battle system that's best described as "a miniatures game for a chess player"

The Nations of the Kordran continent include:

New Halfox - Once mighty empire, torn apart by disinformation and civil war, now humble agriculturalists.
Temla - A nomadic tribe led by vicious warlords. Their devout religion has them chase radioactive meteorites, fallen across the continent.
Captious - A smart and cunning nation, their integration with technology has to lead them down a path like no other.
Shik'aree - The silent Shik'aree tribes dwell in the forests, rarely seen or heard, their greatest asset is their anonymity. 
Hesperian - Traders and industrialists, this nation has long been the cog turning at the heart of Kordra's economy.

Kordran Conflict game system is fast and dynamic, players must combine unit's actions and abilities efficiently to win objective-based scenarios. 
The board is made up of modular barriers that shape the map, these barriers can be build, destroyed, pushed around and more by specific units, making an ever-changing environment that is always in flux. Each scenario varies wildly in its objectives, challenging players to approach the game with new ideas and strategies.

Choose from a large selection of units across 5 Classes: 
Trooper, Assault, Sniper, Heavy and Artillery.

Use their unique abilities and strategy in 5 battle modes: 
Secure, Cargo, Bomb, Control & Bounty

Kordran Conflict is the first of its kind, a unique product that combines traditional boxed game components with .stl files to 3D print at home.
It's a miniatures game designed to grow and expand with new cards that include miniatures and playing pieces to download and then 3D print!
